alert.note: Alert for Walsh (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 25 at 2:13PM CDT until April 29 at 5:00PM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in North Dakota... Forest River at Minto affecting Walsh County. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL FRIDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Moderate flooding is occurring and moderate flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Forest River at Minto. * WHEN...Until Friday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 8.0 feet, MODERATE FLOOD. During high flow, river may bypass Minto to the south and flow into Lake Ardoch. Urban flooding begins. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1:15 PM CDT Monday the stage was 8.3 feet. - Forecast...The river will rise to 8.9 feet tomorrow morning. It will then fall below flood stage late Thursday morning to 5.3 feet and begin rising again early Saturday morning. It will rise to 5.9 feet Monday morning. It will then fall again and remain below flood stage. - Flood stage is 6.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Safety message - Turn around, don`t drown. Don`t travel through flooded areas. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Please report observed flooding to local emergency services or law enforcement and request they pass this information to the National Weather Service when you can do so safely.
